about_the_game:
The game

It Came From Within is a short first-person psychological horror walking simulator which can be completed in 30 minutes.

Set in the mid-1970s, life in the Faraday luxury apartment complex was perfect. That is, until something crawled up the kitchen sink drain. Now it is your reponsibility.

Take care of it. Give it food and entertainment. Watch it grow. Make decisions that will shape how it will grow up. And whatever you do, keep it inside. Do not let it out. For God's sake, never EVER let it out.

Features

  • Mature themes : A short, disturbing story about trauma and parenthood
  • Choices matter : More than 30 different endings possible
  • Low risk gameplay : no enemies putting the player in danger, just a tense and heavy atmosphere

content_descriptors.notes: Implied violence towards a child-like creature.
